metadata.synopsis: Second part of the story of the Emperor.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with one of the special objects inside the cases at the Elfsong's Cellar.(ITEM)S_LOW_Elfsong_EmperorLair_Shell_a950d326-273d-4853-9957-956ec75d0656

0.text: A shell - a keepsake from my final voyage. Pinched in a moment of sentimentality.
